meanings.def: accepting what happens or what people do without trying to change anything or oppose them
examples: He played a passive role in the relationship.
She wore a passive expression on her face as if she didn’t care what happened.
Watching TV is a completely passive activity.
We are passive recipients of information from the world around us.

meanings.def: connected with the form of a verb used when the subject is affected by the action of the verb, for example He was bitten by a dog.
the form of a verb used when the subject is affected by the action of the verb
